    • Method Detail

      • bribe

        public boolean bribe(java.util.List<Combatant> foes,
                     int dailyfee,
                     int bribe,
                     boolean canhire)
        Parameters:
        foes - Opponents.
        dailyfee - For hiring as mercenary (requires passing the DC by 5 or more).
        bribe - Price for getting rid of foes peacefully.
        canhire - If false will not show the option to hire as mercenary.
        Returns:
        false in case a battle is started! Doesn't throw StartBattle.
